com.facebook.react.views.scroll

类 ReactScrollViewCommandHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.views.scroll.ReactScrollViewCommandHelper

  • public class ReactScrollViewCommandHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for view managers to handle commands like 'scrollTo'. Shared by ReactScrollViewManager and ReactHorizontalScrollViewManager.

    • 嵌套类概要
